interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Natural Solution Himalayan Pink Salt Body Scrub with Organic Marula Essential Oil, Moisturizes and Nourishes Face & Skin - 12.3 Oz
Review Date: 2019/10/31
Store: Natural Solution
Product Description: ['Natural Solution Organic Marula Oil Body Scrub Exfoliate and nourish your skin with this luxurious Natural Solution body scrub made with organic marula oil. Marula oil is a natural oil & is known for its ability to moisturize and protect the skin, as well as to reduce the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines. This body scrub is also made with Himalayan pink salt, which is a natural exfoliator that helps to remove dead skin cells and leave your skin feeling smooth and soft. The scrub is gentle enough for daily use, and it is perfect for all skin types. Usage: Apply a generous amount of scrub to wet skin. Massage in circular motions for 2-3 minutes. Rinse with water. Use 2 times per week for best results. Caution: Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse immediately with water. Keep out of reach of children. Store in a cool, dry place. Benefits: 1- Exfoliates and removes dead skin cells 2- Moisturizes and nourishes the skin 3- Protects the skin from free radicals 4- Leaves skin feeling smooth and soft 5-Suitable for all skin types']
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.75 x 3.75 x 3.6 inches; 12.35 Ounces', 'Item model number': '8246E', 'UPC': '818581019775', 'Manufacturer': 'Natural Solution'}
Review Text: Nice salt scrub, leaves my skin feeling so soft and smelling nice.  Recommended.
Review Title: Wonderful product
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Pet Silk Top Knot Gel (4 Ounce) - Pet Hair Gel for Taming Frizzy Hair & Controlling Flyaways – Dog Anti-Static Lotion Cream with Floral Fragrance – Eliminates Static Charges PET SILK {'Brand': 'PET SILK', 'Scent': 'Floral', 'Item Form': 'Lotion,Cream,Gel', 'Unit Count': '4.0 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.76 x 2.76 x 2.56 inches; 4 Ounces', 'Item model number': '844854', 'UPC': '872429001513', 'Manufacturer': 'Pet Silk'} This stuff is amazing! I didn't even know such a product existed and was excited to try it when I found it. My baby shih tzu has a top knot that's in the awkward stage where most will stay in a band or clip but the lower pieces fall down into her eyes.

I applied a bit of this and all the hair is staying put, LOVE THIS SO MICH! This tub will probably last me awhile but when it's gone I will be back to buy more. Keeps puppy and dog fly-away hairs firmly in their bands ELEVEN EVER Electric Nail Drill, Professional Portable Nail File Drill Grinder Manicure Pedicure Tools for Polishing, Sanding, Removing Gel and Acrylic Nails (silver) … (silver) (ND-02black) ELEVEN EVER {'Brand': 'ELEVEN EVER', 'Material': 'Aluminum', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Maximum Rotational Speed': '30000 RPM', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.17 x 6.22 x 2.91 inches; 1.06 Pounds', 'UPC': '722943850534'} Nice nail kit, very thorough on the selection of accessories. Works great. Lots of accessories N3 No Name Necessary Pore Minimizing Moisturizing Scented Long-Lasting Anti-aging and Hydrating Face Primer Spray – (200ml) No Name Necessary {'Brand': 'No Name Necessary', 'Skin Type': 'Normal', 'Package Information': 'Bottle', 'Specialty': 'Moisturizing, Cruelty Free, Vegan', 'Unit Count': '1.0 Ounce', 'Package Dimensions': '7.6 x 1.8 x 1.5 inches; 11.99 Ounces'} Good primer. It sprays on and feels a little sticky for about thirty seconds but then dries and feels smooth on your face. Makeup goes on great and stays on really well. Wish it had an SPF. Recommended. No SPF but keeps makeup in place great JOYYUM 1000W 2-in-1 Hot Air Spin Brush Styler Auto-rotating Negative Ionic Hair Curler Dryer Brush, 1 1/2 Inch and 2 Inch Brush Attachments, Lavander Fog JOYYUM {'Brand': 'JOYYUM', 'Material': 'Titanium', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Special Feature': 'Comb, Portable, Massage, Hot', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Curling', 'Package Dimensions': '16.3 x 5.4 x 3.2 inches; 1.85 Pounds', 'UPC': '787414814279', 'Manufacturer': 'JOYYUM'} I have shorter hair and this worked really well for me, I honestly wasn’t expecting that it was going to work in my shorter hair as the Barrel seems large but to the contrary it does a fabulous job. Recommended A real time saver Mountain Falls Advanced Formula Nail Polish Remover Pads with 96% Acetone, for Natural Nails, 10 Count Mountain Falls {'Brand': 'Mountain Falls', 'Item Form': 'Pad', 'Item Weight': '0.01 Pounds', 'Unit Count': '10 Count'} Very handy and work great. Took these on vacation recently and it was great to not need to take the bottle and worry about leakage. Usually one pad will do all your nails but sometimes it takes a couple. Recommended Great for travel Mountain Falls Nourishing Nail Polish Remover for Natural Nails, with Vitamin E and Panthenol, 6 Fluid Ounce Mountain Falls ["Don't wait for your next spa day to treat yourself. Mountain Falls Nourishing Nail Polish Remover has been carefully formulated to quickly and gently care for your nails. The salon quality formula softens cuticles and contains Vitamin E. Quickly, easily, and gently returns nails to their natural healthy appearance. Our formula is free of Parabens, and Phthalates."] {'Brand': 'Mountain Falls', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Unit Count': '6 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '6.38 x 3 x 1.18 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Vi-Jon'} Great polish remover. I used it to remove three coats of polish and it took it off with one swipe. Recommended Great remover Natural Solution Himalayan Pink Salt Body Scrub with Organic Marula Essential Oil, Moisturizes and Nourishes Face & Skin - 12.3 Oz Natural Solution ['Natural Solution Organic Marula Oil Body Scrub Exfoliate and nourish your skin with this luxurious Natural Solution body scrub made with organic marula oil. Marula oil is a natural oil & is known for its ability to moisturize and protect the skin, as well as to reduce the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines. This body scrub is also made with Himalayan pink salt, which is a natural exfoliator that helps to remove dead skin cells and leave your skin feeling smooth and soft. The scrub is gentle enough for daily use, and it is perfect for all skin types. Usage: Apply a generous amount of scrub to wet skin. Massage in circular motions for 2-3 minutes. Rinse with water. Use 2 times per week for best results. Caution: Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse immediately with water. Keep out of reach of children. Store in a cool, dry place. Benefits: 1- Exfoliates and removes dead skin cells 2- Moisturizes and nourishes the skin 3- Protects the skin from free radicals 4- Leaves skin feeling smooth and soft 5-Suitable for all skin types'] {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.75 x 3.75 x 3.6 inches; 12.35 Ounces', 'Item model number': '8246E', 'UPC': '818581019775', 'Manufacturer': 'Natural Solution'} Nice salt scrub, leaves my skin feeling so soft and smelling nice. Recommended. Wonderful product

actual_interaction.title_meta: Natural Solution Himalayan Pink Salt Body Scrub with Organic Marula Essential Oil, Moisturizes and Nourishes Face & Skin - 12.3 Oz
features: Natural Solution Himalayan Pink Salt Body Scrub With Marula Oil Works As an Anti-Aging Agent, Protecting Your Skin From Damaging Free Radicals, and Preventing Wrinkles and Fine Lines.
Infused with Himalayan Pink Salt, Which Is Rich In Minerals, and Natural Marula Oil, It Helps Revitalize and Invigorate Your Skin, While Leaving It Moisturized and Refreshed.
Himalayan Salt Body Scrub Will Help You Relax & Wash Away Tension. Himalayan Salt Provides a Perfect Mineral-Rich Buffer To Remove The Dull, Dead Skin Cells, Bringing New Life To Your Skin.
Apply a Generous Amount to Wet Skin While Moving in Circular Motion. Rinse with Water. Use 3-4 Times Per Week For Best Result. Recommended To Use Other Natural Solution Products.

The scrub is gentle enough for daily use, and it is perfect for all skin types. Usage: Apply a generous amount of scrub to wet skin. Massage in circular motions for 2-3 minutes. Rinse with water. Use 2 times per week for best results. Caution: Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse immediately with water. Keep out of reach of children. Store in a cool, dry place.
